instruction: Farfetch is a company that operates in the e-commerce industry. It is a platform that allows consumers to purchase high-end fashion and luxury goods from a variety of international brands. Farfetch was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in London, UK. The company has a significant presence in the e-commerce landscape, particularly in the fashion and luxury goods market. Farfetch is owned by a group of investors, including Warburg Pincus, TPG Growth, and Index Ventures. The company has experienced significant growth in recent years and has expanded its operations to include a brick-and-mortar retail presence as well as an online platform. Farfetch has also made strategic acquisitions to expand its reach and offerings, including the acquisition of luxury online retailer Yoox in 2017.
